metadata.title: CVE-2020-8020 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation vulnerabilityin open-build-service allows remote attackers to store arbitrary JS code tocause XSS. This issue affects: openSUSE open-build-service versions priorto 7cc32c8e2ff7290698e101d9a80a9dc29a5500fb.

criterions.comment: open-build-service package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
